description: ff. 284. 235 x 30; 160 x 70 mm. 15 lin. 17th cen. Anon. commentary on qism al-kalām from al-Taftāzānīʼs Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى تحىرت عىون عقول العقلاء من انوار
title: Sharḥ Tahdhīb al-kalām.
subject: Taftāzānī, Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar, 1322-1389?—Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
